From: Martin Weinberg <1 
To:" 
)"  
Cc: Marc Femich 
Subject: Re: Epstein Arrest Seizure Items 
Date: Tue, 16 Jul 2019 00:48:31 +0000 
Hand deliver 
Sony 
for typos 
Marty 
Sent from my iPhone 
On Jul 15, 2019, at 8:40 PM, Martin Weinberg < wrote: 
Hi 
I  have a list of attorneys to send to any taint prosecutor - or i  coukd hand delicer thursday, 
Please let me know 
Marty 
Sent from my iPhone 
On Jul 15, 2019, at 8:34 PM, 
Marc, 
>  wrote: 
Circling back on this, I'll ask the agents to bring the cash and other personal effects seized from Mr. Epstein to the 
hearing on Thursday, unless it is important to receive them before then, in which case please let me know and I'll try to 
arrange that. With respect to the electronic devices, we've obtained a warrant to search them and so will be retaining 
them as evidence. 
thanks, 
From: Marc Fernich <MI> 
Sent: Thursday, July 11, 2019 15:54 
To:I
Cc: Marty Weinberg 
; 
Martin 
Weinberg 
Subject: Epstein Arrest Seizure Items 
Hi MI. Sorry to bug you while you may be working on a bail reply. 
I'm having trouble reaching Agen to coordinate pickup of the cellphone and other items seized upon Epstein's 
arrest. She said she'd be out in the field, but I don't hear from the intermediary agent — identity unknown — who was 
supposed to handle it in her absence. Can you step in and try to move this along? 
Thanks a lot. 
EFTA00021402

Marc Fernich, Esq. 
Sent from my iPhone 
On Jul 9, 2019, at 3:26 PM, wrote: 
Marc, 
It is the right number, so feel free to follow up later, but I can also give you her cell number which 
thanks, 
From: Marc Fernich < 
Sent: Tuesday, July 09, 2019 14:56 
To: 
Cc: Marty 
Weinberg 
Subject: Re: U.S. v. Epstein, 19 Cr. 490 (RMB), Government bail memorandum 
; Martin Weinberg cz
>; 
Sorry to trouble again. No answer or VM pickup at that number. I'll try again later so long as it's the right number. 
Can you confirm? Many thanks. 
Marc Fernich, Esq. 
Sent from my iPhone 
On Jul 9, 2019, at 2:45 PM, 
Marc, 
wrote: 
Apologies for the delay on this, and thanks for following up. The best way to coordinate this is to contact the case 
agent directly — I just spoke to her so she'll be expecting your call. They're running around, so if you reach out and 
aren't able to connect today please let me know, but hopefully we can get it coordinated. The contact is Special 
Agent and she can be reached a 
EFTA00021403

thanks, 
From: Marc 
Fernich < 
Sent: Monday, July 08, 2019 15:40 
To: 
Subject: Re: U.S. v. Epstein, 19 Cr. 490 (RMB), Government bail memorandum 
One of your agents told Marty the case agent would return Epstein's phone, the cash and other items taken from 
his person upon arrest. Marty's returning to Boston shortly. Can you arrange for me to take possession of those 
items? 
Thanks, 
Marc 
Marc Fernich, Esq. 
Sent from my iPhone 
On Jul 8, 2019, at 10:53 AM, 
Marc, 
)< 
wrote: 
Wanted to send this to you as well in case your co-counsel can't receive it in the Court. Please let me know if it 
would be helpful to get a hard copy — I'm copying two of our paralegals who can bring you (or co-counsel) a copy; 
I'll be unreachable for the next hour or so. 
thank you, 
From: 
Sent: Monday, July 08, 2019 10:43 
To: 
Cc: 
'Martin Weinberg' 
c 
>; ' 
>; 
Subject: RE: U.S. v. Epstein, 19 Cr. 490 (RMB), Government bail memorandum 
To the Chambers of Judge Pitman: 
EFTA00021404

In advance of the expected bail argument in the above-captioned case, in connection with the presentment and 
arraignment referred by Judge Berman, attached please find a memorandum from the government on the issue 
of detention. Defense counsel is copied, as is the chambers of Judge Berman at their request. 
Thank you, 
Assistant U.S. Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
<U.S. v. Epstein, 19 Cr. 490 (RMB), Government bail memorandum.pdf> 
EFTA00021405
